channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 匈牙利很可能在周二放慢降息步伐，因为福林的疲软限制了降低欧盟最高借贷成本的空间
item.description:
Hungary will most likely slow the pace of its rate cuts Tuesday as the weakness of the forint limits room to lower the EU's highest borrowing costs https://t.co/qS8aYfShLB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）开始了为期三天的巴西之行，这是他在发达国家和所谓的全球南方国家之间搭建桥梁的困扰战略的一部分。
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron begins a three-day trip to Brazil as part of his troubled strategy to build bridges between developed nations and the so-called Global South https://t.co/yI8sr7x6vw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 尼日利亚央行将再次降息，以显示其粉碎数十年高通胀和吸引投资的决心
item.description:
Nigeria's central bank is set to deliver another interest-rate to show its resolve to crush decades-high inflation and attract investment https://t.co/xDBrqkeGwk

item.title: 从澳大利亚到印度尼西亚的活畜出口船上爆发疾病，造成至少 100 头牛死亡，凸显了活畜出口的福利风险。
item.description:
A disease outbreak has killed at least 100 cattle traveling on a live-export ship from Australia to Indonesia, highlighting welfare risks of exporting livestock https://t.co/g1YIz9IKhX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 日本制药商小林制药公司称，该公司收到报告称，一名服用其召回的补充剂药丸的用户因肾病死亡，此后该公司股价延续了周一的跌势。
item.description:
Shares of Japanese drugmaker Kobayashi Pharmaceutical extended Monday’s slump after the company said it received a report one of the users of its recalled supplement pills died due to kidney disease https://t.co/UAAzdoAMiA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 由于热浪威胁到最大出口国越南的生产，意式浓缩咖啡和速溶饮料中使用的罗布斯塔咖啡的全球供应将进一步紧缩
item.description:
Global supplies of robusta coffee used in espresso and instant drinks are set to tighten further as a heat wave threatens production in top exporter Vietnam https://t.co/uZCswmECaZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 乔治-弗格森（George Ferguson）谈到了波音新任首席执行官面临的最大挑战。
item.description:
Boeing’s customers finally have what they’ve been after: a leadership shakeup.

George Ferguson talks about the biggest challenge facing the new Boeing CEO https://t.co/WvoejFXGCi pic.twitter.com/4Hx4Fe2iiM

item.title: 印度期权交易商几乎不担心即将到来的大选会打破市场稳步走高的势头，这很可能使他们面临意外的结果。@Chiranjivi_25 报道
item.description:
India options traders are showing little fear that the upcoming general elections will upset the market’s steady churn higher, likely leaving them exposed to a surprise outcome. @Chiranjivi_25 reports https://t.co/AhsrjBo3VN pic.twitter.com/EjW6FOtyZD

— Bloomberg TV (@BloombergTV) March 26, 2024

item.title: 马哈蒂尔-穆罕默德的两个长子说，马来西亚反贪局命令他们协助调查他们的父亲，并首次透露，一项长达数月的调查正针对这位 98 岁的前总理。
item.description:
Mahathir Mohamad’s two eldest sons said Malaysia’s anti-graft agency ordered them to assist with an investigation into their father, revealing for the first time that a monthslong probe is targeting the 98-year-old former premier https://t.co/zenByNgftO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 可可有史以来首次突破 9000 美元大关，价格超过铜
item.description:
Cocoa extends its record-breaking run above $9,000 for the first time ever, making it more expensive than copper https://t.co/gfWAjeyM6X pic.twitter.com/oosDTUPW6O

— Bloomberg TV (@BloombergTV) March 26, 2024

item.title: 南非环境部长表示，她在生物多样性领域的雄心壮志与为实现气候目标而投入的数十亿美元所显示的规模相同
item.description:
South Africa's environment minister said she has the same scale of ambition for the biodiversity sector as has been shown in the billions of dollars being spent to attain its climate ambitions https://t.co/uFi2OX6F7b

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚最大银行的老板表示，该国应取消两项关键的税收，这是银行家就如何促进经济提出的一些最强烈的建议。
item.description:
The boss of Australia’s biggest bank said the country should abolish two key levies, marking some of the strongest suggestions yet by a banker on ways to boost the economy. https://t.co/Nh9bZLIF1h

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 新消息：埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "星链"（Starlink）公司走私的套件正在被激活，甚至在其没有运营协议的地区也是如此。这引起了人们对卫星互联网服务控制权的质疑。请点击这里阅读《大事件》⬇️。
item.description:
NEW: Smuggled kits from Elon Musk's Starlink are being activated even in territories where it has no agreement to operate. That raises questions about control of the satellite internet service.

Read The Big Take here ⬇️ https://t.co/rWh8PJ56u1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 投资者对日元进一步走软的预期越来越强烈，这一点从套期保值成本下降中可见一斑
item.description:
Expectations of further yen weakening are getting more entrenched among investors, as seen in tumbling hedging costs https://t.co/ox4YATTl9K

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 比特币最近飙升至历史新高，表明与亚洲相比，美国加密货币的波动性正变得更加剧烈

item.title: 一份政府报告显示，在哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）实行货币贬值后，阿根廷私营部门的工资创下了近三十年来的最大降幅。
item.description:
